statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialSecurityTasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_id, task_status FROM FinancialSecurityTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name AS Name, task_description AS Description FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_script FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_status IN ('Pending', 'In Progress') LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM FinancialSecurityTasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_systems;
SELECT system_name, security_level FROM financial_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, security_level FROM financial_systems WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT system_name FROM financial_systems WHERE system_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patch_id, patch_description, patch_date FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, security_level FROM financial_systems WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_systems WHERE security_level > 3 ORDER BY system_name DESC;

SELECT system_id, system_name, patch_date FROM financial_systems JOIN security_patches ON financial_systems.system_id = security_patches.system_affected WHERE security_patches.patch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date ASC;

SELECT system_id, system_name, COUNT(patch_id) AS total_patches FROM financial_systems LEFT JOIN security_patches ON financial_systems.system_id = security_patches.system_affected GROUP BY system_id, system_name;
SELECT system_name, MAX(security_level) AS max_security_level FROM financial_systems GROUP BY system_name HAVING MAX(security_level) > 5;
SELECT * FROM security_patch_management
SELECT id, script_name, created_at FROM security_patch_management
SELECT task_description, script_owner FROM security_patch_management WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM security_tasks_history ORDER BY executed_at DESC
SELECT task_id, result FROM security_tasks_history WHERE executed_by = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM security_patch_management ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_description, script_name, created_at FROM security_patch_management WHERE script_owner = 'Admin' AND script_content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT system_name, current_version, last_patched_at FROM financial_systems WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY last_patched_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_tasks_history WHERE task_id = 101 AND executed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT system_id, system_name, status FROM financial_systems WHERE current_version LIKE '%1.0%' AND status ='Pending';
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, system_type, system_owner FROM financial_systems WHERE system_type = 'Production';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM security_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT script_name, script_type FROM automation_scripts WHERE script_type = 'Python';
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM security_patches WHERE patch_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM financial_systems ORDER BY system_name;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM security_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT script_name, script_type FROM automation_scripts WHERE script_type = 'Python';
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_version DESC;
SELECT patch_name, patch_release_date FROM security_patches WHERE patch_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT system_name, system_owner FROM financial_systems WHERE system_type = 'Database';
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM security_actions WHERE action_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM security_patches;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description, patch_version FROM security_patches WHERE patch_release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, system_type, system_owner FROM financial_systems ORDER BY system_owner ASC;
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_type, task_status FROM security_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT action_name, action_description, action_status FROM security_actions WHERE action_type = 'prevention' ORDER BY action_name DESC;
